to_fun_bilinear_apply:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/-

@[simp]
theorem to_fun_bilinear_apply (a : A) (m : matrix n n R) :
    to_fun_bilinear R A n a m = «expr • » a (m.map (algebra_map R A)) :=
  rfl
#align to_fun_bilinear_apply to_fun_bilinear_apply
to_fun_alg_hom_apply:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⊗ₜ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
@[simp]
theorem to_fun_alg_hom_apply (a : A) (m : matrix n n R) :
    to_fun_alg_hom R A n («expr ⊗ₜ » a m) = «expr • » a (m.map (algebra_map R A)) := by
  simp [to_fun_alg_hom, alg_hom_of_linear_map_tensor_product, to_fun_linear]
#align to_fun_alg_hom_apply to_fun_alg_hom_apply
right_inv:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⇑ » -/
theorem right_inv (M : matrix n n A) : (to_fun_alg_hom R A n) (inv_fun R A n M) = M :=
  by
  simp only [inv_fun, alg_hom.map_sum, std_basis_matrix, apply_ite («expr⇑ » (algebra_map R A)), smul_eq_mul, mul_boole,
    to_fun_alg_hom_apply, RingHom.map_zero, RingHom.map_one, matrix.map_apply, pi.smul_def]
  convert finset.sum_product; apply matrix_eq_sum_std_basis
#align right_inv right_inv
matrix_equiv_tensor_apply_symm:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⊗ₜ » -/
@[simp]
theorem matrix_equiv_tensor_apply_symm (a : A) (M : matrix n n R) :
    (matrix_equiv_tensor R A n).symm («expr ⊗ₜ » a M) = M.map fun x => a * algebra_map R A x :=
  by
  simp [matrix_equiv_tensor, to_fun_alg_hom, alg_hom_of_linear_map_tensor_product, to_fun_linear]
  rfl
#align matrix_equiv_tensor_apply_symm matrix_equiv_tensor_apply_symm
matrix_equiv_tensor_apply_std_basis:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⊗ₜ » -/
@[simp]
theorem matrix_equiv_tensor_apply_std_basis (i j : n) (x : A) :
    matrix_equiv_tensor R A n (std_basis_matrix i j x) = «expr ⊗ₜ » x (std_basis_matrix i j 1) :=
  by
  have t : ∀ p : n × n, i = p.1 ∧ j = p.2 ↔ p = (i, j) := by tidy
  simp [ite_tmul, t, std_basis_matrix]
#align matrix_equiv_tensor_apply_std_basis matrix_equiv_tensor_apply_std_basis
matrix_equiv_tensor_apply:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `finset.sum_univ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum_univ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⊗ₜ » -/
@[simp]
theorem matrix_equiv_tensor_apply (M : matrix n n A) :
    matrix_equiv_tensor R A n M =
      finset.sum_univ "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `finset.sum_univ"
        («expr ⊗ₜ » (M p.1 p.2) (std_basis_matrix p.1 p.2 1)) :=
  rfl
#align matrix_equiv_tensor_apply matrix_equiv_tensor_apply
left_inv:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `tensor_product -/
theorem left_inv (M : tensor_product A R (matrix n n R)) : inv_fun R A n (to_fun_alg_hom R A n M) = M :=
  by
  induction' M using tensor_product.induction_on with a m x y hx hy
  · simp
  · simp
  · simp [alg_hom.map_sum, hx, hy]
#align left_inv left_inv
inv_fun_zero:
@[simp]
theorem inv_fun_zero : inv_fun R A n 0 = 0 := by simp [inv_fun]
#align inv_fun_zero inv_fun_zero
inv_fun_smul:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⊗ₜ » -/
@[simp]
theorem inv_fun_smul (a : A) (M : matrix n n A) : inv_fun R A n («expr • » a M) = «expr ⊗ₜ » a 1 * inv_fun R A n M := by
  simp [inv_fun, finset.mul_sum]
#align inv_fun_smul inv_fun_smul
inv_fun_algebra_map:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⊗ₜ » -/
@[simp]
theorem inv_fun_algebra_map (M : matrix n n R) : inv_fun R A n (M.map (algebra_map R A)) = «expr ⊗ₜ » 1 M :=
  by
  dsimp [inv_fun]
  simp only [algebra.algebra_map_eq_smul_one, smul_tmul, ← tmul_sum, mul_boole]
  congr
  conv_rhs => rw [matrix_eq_sum_std_basis M]
  convert finset.sum_product; simp
#align inv_fun_algebra_map inv_fun_algebra_map
inv_fun_add:
@[simp]
theorem inv_fun_add (M N : matrix n n A) : inv_fun R A n (M + N) = inv_fun R A n M + inv_fun R A n N := by
  simp [inv_fun, add_tmul, finset.sum_add_distrib]
#align inv_fun_add inv_fun_add
